text: In the second [strongs id="h8147" /] year [strongs id="h8141" /] of Darius [strongs id="h1867" /] the king [strongs id="h4428" /], in the sixth [strongs id="h8345" /] month [strongs id="h2320" /], in the first [strongs id="h259" /] day [strongs id="h3117" /] of the month [strongs id="h2320" /], came the word [strongs id="h1697" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] by [strongs id="h3027" /] Haggai [strongs id="h2292" /] the prophet [strongs id="h5030" /] unto Zerubbabel [strongs id="h2216" /] the son [strongs id="h1121" /] of Shealtiel [strongs id="h7597" /], governor [strongs id="h6346" /] of Judah [strongs id="h3063" /], and to Joshua [strongs id="h3091" /] the son [strongs id="h1121" /] of Josedech [strongs id="h3087" /], the high [strongs id="h1419" /] priest [strongs id="h3548" /], saying [strongs id="h559" tvm="8800" /],

Thus speaketh [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /], saying [strongs id="h559" tvm="8800" /], This people [strongs id="h5971" /] say [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /], The time [strongs id="h6256" /] is not come [strongs id="h935" tvm="8800" /], the time [strongs id="h6256" /] that the LORD’S [strongs id="h3068" /] house [strongs id="h1004" /] should be built [strongs id="h1129" tvm="8736" /].

Then came the word [strongs id="h1697" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] by [strongs id="h3027" /] Haggai [strongs id="h2292" /] the prophet [strongs id="h5030" /], saying [strongs id="h559" tvm="8800" /],

[Is it] time [strongs id="h6256" /] for you, O ye, to dwell [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8800" /] in your cieled [strongs id="h5603" tvm="8803" /] houses [strongs id="h1004" /], and this house [strongs id="h1004" /] [lie] waste [strongs id="h2720" /]?

Now therefore thus saith [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /]; Consider [strongs id="h7760" tvm="8798" /] [strongs id="h3824" /] your ways [strongs id="h1870" /].

Ye have sown [strongs id="h2232" tvm="8804" /] much [strongs id="h7235" tvm="8687" /], and bring [strongs id="h935" tvm="8687" /] in little [strongs id="h4592" /]; ye eat [strongs id="h398" tvm="8800" /], but ye have not enough [strongs id="h7654" /]; ye drink [strongs id="h8354" tvm="8800" /], but ye are not filled with drink [strongs id="h7937" tvm="8800" /]; ye clothe [strongs id="h3847" tvm="8800" /] you, but there is none warm [strongs id="h2527" /]; and he that earneth wages [strongs id="h7936" tvm="8693" /] earneth wages [strongs id="h7936" tvm="8693" /] [to put it] into a bag [strongs id="h6872" /] with holes [strongs id="h5344" tvm="8803" /].

Thus saith [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /]; Consider [strongs id="h7760" tvm="8798" /] [strongs id="h3824" /] your ways [strongs id="h1870" /].

Go up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8798" /] to the mountain [strongs id="h2022" /], and bring [strongs id="h935" tvm="8689" /] wood [strongs id="h6086" /], and build [strongs id="h1129" tvm="8798" /] the house [strongs id="h1004" /]; and I will take pleasure [strongs id="h7521" tvm="8799" /] in it, and I will be glorified [strongs id="h3513" tvm="8735" /], saith [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /].

Ye looked [strongs id="h6437" tvm="8800" /] for much [strongs id="h7235" tvm="8687" /], and, lo, [it came] to little [strongs id="h4592" /]; and when ye brought [strongs id="h935" tvm="8689" /] [it] home [strongs id="h1004" /], I did blow [strongs id="h5301" tvm="8804" /] upon it. Why? saith [strongs id="h5002" tvm="8803" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /]. Because [strongs id="h3282" /] of mine house [strongs id="h1004" /] that [is] waste [strongs id="h2720" /], and ye run [strongs id="h7323" tvm="8801" /] every man [strongs id="h376" /] unto his own house [strongs id="h1004" /].

Therefore the heaven [strongs id="h8064" /] over you is stayed [strongs id="h3607" tvm="8804" /] from dew [strongs id="h2919" /], and the earth [strongs id="h776" /] is stayed [strongs id="h3607" tvm="8804" /] [from] her fruit [strongs id="h2981" /].

And I called [strongs id="h7121" tvm="8799" /] for a drought [strongs id="h2721" /] upon the land [strongs id="h776" /], and upon the mountains [strongs id="h2022" /], and upon the corn [strongs id="h1715" /], and upon the new wine [strongs id="h8492" /], and upon the oil [strongs id="h3323" /], and upon [that] which the ground [strongs id="h127" /] bringeth forth [strongs id="h3318" tvm="8686" /], and upon men [strongs id="h120" /], and upon cattle [strongs id="h929" /], and upon all the labour [strongs id="h3018" /] of the hands [strongs id="h3709" /].

Then Zerubbabel [strongs id="h2216" /] the son [strongs id="h1121" /] of Shealtiel [strongs id="h7597" /], and Joshua [strongs id="h3091" /] the son [strongs id="h1121" /] of Josedech [strongs id="h3087" /], the high [strongs id="h1419" /] priest [strongs id="h3548" /], with all the remnant [strongs id="h7611" /] of the people [strongs id="h5971" /], obeyed [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8799" /] the voice [strongs id="h6963" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] their God [strongs id="h430" /], and the words [strongs id="h1697" /] of Haggai [strongs id="h2292" /] the prophet [strongs id="h5030" /], as the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] their God [strongs id="h430" /] had sent [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8804" /] him, and the people [strongs id="h5971" /] did fear [strongs id="h3372" tvm="8799" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /].

Then spake [strongs id="h559" tvm="8799" /] Haggai [strongs id="h2292" /] the LORD’S [strongs id="h3068" /] messenger [strongs id="h4397" /] in the LORD’S [strongs id="h3068" /] message [strongs id="h4400" /] unto the people [strongs id="h5971" /], saying [strongs id="h559" tvm="8800" /], I [am] with you, saith [strongs id="h5002" tvm="8803" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /].

And the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] stirred up [strongs id="h5782" tvm="8686" /] the spirit [strongs id="h7307" /] of Zerubbabel [strongs id="h2216" /] the son [strongs id="h1121" /] of Shealtiel [strongs id="h7597" /], governor [strongs id="h6346" /] of Judah [strongs id="h3063" /], and the spirit [strongs id="h7307" /] of Joshua [strongs id="h3091" /] the son [strongs id="h1121" /] of Josedech [strongs id="h3087" /], the high [strongs id="h1419" /] priest [strongs id="h3548" /], and the spirit [strongs id="h7307" /] of all the remnant [strongs id="h7611" /] of the people [strongs id="h5971" /]; and they came [strongs id="h935" tvm="8799" /] and did [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8799" /] work [strongs id="h4399" /] in the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /], their God [strongs id="h430" /],

In the four [strongs id="h702" /] and twentieth [strongs id="h6242" /] day [strongs id="h3117" /] of the sixth [strongs id="h8345" /] month [strongs id="h2320" /], in the second [strongs id="h8147" /] year [strongs id="h8141" /] of Darius [strongs id="h1867" /] the king [strongs id="h4428" /].

In the seventh [strongs id="h7637" /] [month], in the one [strongs id="h259" /] and twentieth [strongs id="h6242" /] [day] of the month [strongs id="h2320" /], came the word [strongs id="h1697" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] by [strongs id="h3027" /] the prophet [strongs id="h5030" /] Haggai [strongs id="h2292" /], saying [strongs id="h559" tvm="8800" /],

Speak [strongs id="h559" tvm="8798" /] now to Zerubbabel [strongs id="h2216" /] the son [strongs id="h1121" /] of Shealtiel [strongs id="h7597" /], governor [strongs id="h6346" /] of Judah [strongs id="h3063" /], and to Joshua [strongs id="h3091" /] the son [strongs id="h1121" /] of Josedech [strongs id="h3087" /], the high [strongs id="h1419" /] priest [strongs id="h3548" /], and to the residue [strongs id="h7611" /] of the people [strongs id="h5971" /], saying [strongs id="h559" tvm="8800" /],

Who [is] left [strongs id="h7604" tvm="8737" /] among you that saw [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8804" /] this house [strongs id="h1004" /] in her first [strongs id="h7223" /] glory [strongs id="h3519" /]? and how do ye see [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8802" /] it now? [is it] not in your eyes [strongs id="h5869" /] in comparison [strongs id="h3644" /] of it as nothing?

Yet now be strong [strongs id="h2388" tvm="8798" /], O Zerubbabel [strongs id="h2216" /], saith [strongs id="h5002" tvm="8803" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /]; and be strong [strongs id="h2388" tvm="8798" /], O Joshua [strongs id="h3091" /], son [strongs id="h1121" /] of Josedech [strongs id="h3087" /], the high [strongs id="h1419" /] priest [strongs id="h3548" /]; and be strong [strongs id="h2388" tvm="8798" /], all ye people [strongs id="h5971" /] of the land [strongs id="h776" /], saith [strongs id="h5002" tvm="8803" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], and work [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8798" /]: for I [am] with you, saith [strongs id="h5002" tvm="8803" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /]:

[According to] the word [strongs id="h1697" /] that I covenanted [strongs id="h3772" tvm="8804" /] with you when ye came [strongs id="h3318" tvm="8800" /] out of Egypt [strongs id="h4714" /], so my spirit [strongs id="h7307" /] remaineth [strongs id="h5975" tvm="8802" /] among [strongs id="h8432" /] you: fear [strongs id="h3372" tvm="8799" /] ye not.

For thus saith [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /]; Yet once [strongs id="h259" /], it [is] a little while [strongs id="h4592" /], and I will shake [strongs id="h7493" tvm="8688" /] the heavens [strongs id="h8064" /], and the earth [strongs id="h776" /], and the sea [strongs id="h3220" /], and the dry [strongs id="h2724" /] [land];

And I will shake [strongs id="h7493" tvm="8689" /] all nations [strongs id="h1471" /], and the desire [strongs id="h2532" /] of all nations [strongs id="h1471" /] shall come [strongs id="h935" tvm="8804" /]: and I will fill [strongs id="h4390" tvm="8765" /] this house [strongs id="h1004" /] with glory [strongs id="h3519" /], saith [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /].
The silver [strongs id="h3701" /] [is] mine, and the gold [strongs id="h2091" /] [is] mine, saith [strongs id="h5002" tvm="8803" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /].

The glory [strongs id="h3519" /] of this latter [strongs id="h314" /] house [strongs id="h1004" /] shall be greater than [strongs id="h1419" /] of the former [strongs id="h7223" /], saith [strongs id="h5002" tvm="8803" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /]: and in this place [strongs id="h4725" /] will I give [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8799" /] peace [strongs id="h7965" /], saith [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /].

In the four [strongs id="h702" /] and twentieth [strongs id="h6242" /] [day] of the ninth [strongs id="h8671" /] [month], in the second [strongs id="h8147" /] year [strongs id="h8141" /] of Darius [strongs id="h1867" /], came the word [strongs id="h1697" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] by [strongs id="h3027" /] Haggai [strongs id="h2292" /] the prophet [strongs id="h5030" /], saying [strongs id="h559" tvm="8800" /],

Thus saith [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /]; Ask [strongs id="h7592" tvm="8798" /] now the priests [strongs id="h3548" /] [concerning] the law [strongs id="h8451" /], saying [strongs id="h559" tvm="8800" /],

If one [strongs id="h376" /] bear [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8799" /] holy [strongs id="h6944" /] flesh [strongs id="h1320" /] in the skirt [strongs id="h3671" /] of his garment [strongs id="h899" /], and with his skirt [strongs id="h3671" /] do touch [strongs id="h5060" tvm="8804" /] bread [strongs id="h3899" /], or pottage [strongs id="h5138" /], or wine [strongs id="h3196" /], or oil [strongs id="h8081" /], or any meat [strongs id="h3978" /], shall it be holy [strongs id="h6942" tvm="8799" /]? And the priests [strongs id="h3548" /] answered [strongs id="h6030" tvm="8799" /] and said [strongs id="h559" tvm="8799" /], No.

Then said [strongs id="h559" tvm="8799" /] Haggai [strongs id="h2292" /], If [one that is] unclean [strongs id="h2931" /] by a dead body [strongs id="h5315" /] touch [strongs id="h5060" tvm="8799" /] any of these, shall it be unclean [strongs id="h2930" tvm="8799" /]? And the priests [strongs id="h3548" /] answered [strongs id="h6030" tvm="8799" /] and said [strongs id="h559" tvm="8799" /], It shall be unclean [strongs id="h2930" tvm="8799" /].

Then answered [strongs id="h6030" tvm="8799" /] Haggai [strongs id="h2292" /], and said [strongs id="h559" tvm="8799" /], So [is] this people [strongs id="h5971" /], and so [is] this nation [strongs id="h1471" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] me, saith [strongs id="h5002" tvm="8803" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /]; and so [is] every work [strongs id="h4639" /] of their hands [strongs id="h3027" /]; and that which they offer [strongs id="h7126" tvm="8686" /] there [is] unclean [strongs id="h2931" /].

And now, I pray you, consider [strongs id="h7760" tvm="8798" /] [strongs id="h3824" /] from this day [strongs id="h3117" /] and upward [strongs id="h4605" /], from before [strongs id="h2962" /] a stone [strongs id="h68" /] was laid [strongs id="h7760" tvm="8800" /] upon a stone [strongs id="h68" /] in the temple [strongs id="h1964" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /]:

Since those [days] were, when [one] came [strongs id="h935" tvm="8804" /] to an heap [strongs id="h6194" /] of twenty [strongs id="h6242" /] [measures], there were [but] ten [strongs id="h6235" /]: when [one] came [strongs id="h935" tvm="8804" /] to the pressfat [strongs id="h3342" /] for to draw out [strongs id="h2834" tvm="8800" /] fifty [strongs id="h2572" /] [vessels] out of the press [strongs id="h6333" /], there were [but] twenty [strongs id="h6242" /].

I smote [strongs id="h5221" tvm="8689" /] you with blasting [strongs id="h7711" /] and with mildew [strongs id="h3420" /] and with hail [strongs id="h1259" /] in all the labours [strongs id="h4639" /] of your hands [strongs id="h3027" /]; yet ye [turned] not to me, saith [strongs id="h5002" tvm="8803" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /].

Consider [strongs id="h7760" tvm="8798" /] [strongs id="h3824" /] now from this day [strongs id="h3117" /] and upward [strongs id="h4605" /], from the four [strongs id="h702" /] and twentieth [strongs id="h6242" /] day [strongs id="h3117" /] of the ninth [strongs id="h8671" /] [month, even] from the day [strongs id="h3117" /] that the foundation [strongs id="h3245" tvm="8795" /] of the LORD’S [strongs id="h3068" /] temple [strongs id="h1964" /] was laid, consider [strongs id="h7760" tvm="8798" /] [strongs id="h3824" /] [it].

Is the seed [strongs id="h2233" /] yet in the barn [strongs id="h4035" /]? yea, as yet the vine [strongs id="h1612" /], and the fig tree [strongs id="h8384" /], and the pomegranate [strongs id="h7416" /], and the olive [strongs id="h2132" /] tree [strongs id="h6086" /], hath not brought forth [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8804" /]: from this day [strongs id="h3117" /] will I bless [strongs id="h1288" tvm="8762" /] [you].

And again [strongs id="h8145" /] the word [strongs id="h1697" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] came unto Haggai [strongs id="h2292" /] in the four [strongs id="h702" /] and twentieth [strongs id="h6242" /] [day] of the month [strongs id="h2320" /], saying [strongs id="h559" tvm="8800" /],

Speak [strongs id="h559" tvm="8798" /] to Zerubbabel [strongs id="h2216" /], governor [strongs id="h6346" /] of Judah [strongs id="h3063" /], saying [strongs id="h559" tvm="8800" /], I will shake [strongs id="h7493" tvm="8688" /] the heavens [strongs id="h8064" /] and the earth [strongs id="h776" /];

And I will overthrow [strongs id="h2015" tvm="8804" /] the throne [strongs id="h3678" /] of kingdoms [strongs id="h4467" /], and I will destroy [strongs id="h8045" tvm="8689" /] the strength [strongs id="h2392" /] of the kingdoms [strongs id="h4467" /] of the heathen [strongs id="h1471" /]; and I will overthrow [strongs id="h2015" tvm="8804" /] the chariots [strongs id="h4818" /], and those that ride [strongs id="h7392" tvm="8802" /] in them; and the horses [strongs id="h5483" /] and their riders [strongs id="h7392" tvm="8802" /] shall come down [strongs id="h3381" tvm="8804" /], every one [strongs id="h376" /] by the sword [strongs id="h2719" /] of his brother [strongs id="h251" /].

In that day [strongs id="h3117" /], saith [strongs id="h5002" tvm="8803" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /], will I take [strongs id="h3947" tvm="8799" /] thee, O Zerubbabel [strongs id="h2216" /], my servant [strongs id="h5650" /], the son [strongs id="h1121" /] of Shealtiel [strongs id="h7597" /], saith [strongs id="h5002" tvm="8803" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], and will make [strongs id="h7760" tvm="8804" /] thee as a signet [strongs id="h2368" /]: for I have chosen [strongs id="h977" tvm="8804" /] thee, saith [strongs id="h5002" tvm="8803" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] of hosts [strongs id="h6635" /].
